Text:
Wrong catgory, this is NOT 720P !

Resolution is 712x400

yeah your right it is, tho i would say your never going to get true hd with this film considering the source material is mostly all old footage anything that is hd is just upscaled, and playing this on a modern tv will just upscale it anyway

thank-you to the uploader picture 9/10 and audio 9/10
English subs are hard written in to the non English speaking parts (no messing around) you really need subs in your language to watch this film. Unless you speak English and Portuguese that is. would recommend this copy...
